author: vmassol
msg: Aligning the EAR-ing behavior in the Cactus plugin for
Maven with the behavior from the EAR Maven plugin. More specifically,
fixes a bug in the generation of the EAR descriptor.

author: vmassol
msg: Fixed URL to JUnit FAQ. Thanks to Kazuhito.

author: vmassol
msg: In the Form authentication code, changed the response check logic for the pre-authentication step to accept any status code less than 400. It was previously only accepting a 302 code but different servers are implementing it differently. Patch from Kazuhito.
